definition: to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: I send this Valen tine’s card to remind you that I love you.
sentences.chinese: 我送上這張卡片，爲的是要提醒你，我愛你。

sentences.english: User stories are typically written on 4x6 cards.
sentences.chinese: 用戶需求典型地是寫在4x6的卡片上。

sentences.english: We strongly recommend that you now take a moment to read this safety card before take-off.
sentences.chinese: 我們強烈建議您花幾分鐘時間在起飛前閱讀安全卡片。

sentences.english: His paintings and postcards are always thought-provoking and at the same time quite funny to look at.
sentences.chinese: 他的圖畫和卡片在發人深省的同時看着還相當的有趣。

sentences.english: Ms. Yeoman also sells self-illustrated greeting cards.
sentences.chinese: 除此之外，雅曼女士還銷售自制的問候卡片。

sentences.english: For heavily brocaded materials, the patterns were created by shuffling through a deck of cards.
sentences.chinese: 對浮花很重的材料，圖案由混排一套卡片而織成。

sentences.english: A number of commercial organizations in the United States have provided catalogue cards and other services.
sentences.chinese: 在美國許多商業組織提供目錄卡片及其他服務。

sentences.english: He was addressing a card to an old family friend.
sentences.chinese: 他正在給一位家庭舊友寫卡片。

sentences.english: He doubled the rubber band about the cards.
sentences.chinese: 他把橡皮筋在卡片上繞了兩圈。

sentences.english: She gets a lot of presents and birthday cards from her family and relatives.
sentences.chinese: 她從她的家庭和親戚那裏收到許多禮物和生日卡片。

sentences.english: I'll send my QSL card directly to you after receive yours.
sentences.chinese: 我將把卡片直接寄給你，在收到你的之後。

sentences.english: I wish I'd written the words on this beautiful card.
sentences.chinese: 我多麼希望這張美麗的卡片上的話語出自我的筆下。

sentences.english: All of the interior stones fit so well, a card won't fit between them.
sentences.chinese: 內部所有的石塊都嚴絲合縫，連一張卡片都插不進去。

sentences.english: This card is to show that we still care.
sentences.chinese: 這張卡片是告訴您，我們仍然想念您。

sentences.english: Please consult the card catalogue or the computer.
sentences.chinese: 請查閱卡片目錄或計算機。

definition: a piece, scrap or fragment of paper
